title: Free to Good Home
description: They love you, they raise you, they drive you crazy. What if you could put your parents up for adoption when they do? The lead-off story in this collection is a delightfully whimsical what-if explores the boundaries what it means to be family. Six more amuse, provoke and even horrify. Includes all four Celebrity Supernatural stories: Conjuring Johnny Depp, Finding Southside Johnny, Raising Jerry Garcia and Walking with Elvis, as well as After the Rapture, and Enhanced.
author: Anne Kelleher
